Typically started with a line in /etc/crontab like this:

01 00 `*` `*` `*` g3tester neurospaces_cron

g3tester is a  user set up for permissions to perform a 'sudo make install,' and 'sudo make uninstall' to run the job at 1 minute after midnight. To set up a regular user to use sudo, add them to the /etc/sudoers file.
